title: Falkirk
name: Falkirk Wheel
directions: Half hourly buses from Falkirk town centre, or a good walk from the Falkirk "Camelon" railway station. You can also cycle along the Union Canal from Edinburgh - the route (about 50km) is part of the [http://www.sustrans.org.uk/ncn/map/route/route-754 National Cycle Network Route 754]
price: Boat trips cost £8.95 adults, £4.95 children, £7.95 concessions. Free entry to the visitor centre / cafe / gift shop
content: Built in 2001 to reconnect the ''Forth and Clyde Canal'' with the ''Union Canal'', it is the world's only rotating boat lift. Boat trips up on the Wheel take about an hour.
